name: Candice Michelle HARDWICK, By and Through Her Parents and Guardians, Daryl Lewis Hardwick, et ux., petitioner, v. Martha HEYWARD, Individually and in Her Official Capacity as Principal of Latta Middle School, et al.

casebody.head_matter:
Candice Michelle HARDWICK, By and Through Her Parents and Guardians, Daryl Lewis Hardwick, et ux., petitioner,
v.
Martha HEYWARD, Individually and in Her Official Capacity as Principal of Latta Middle School, et al.

Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 7, 2013.
Case below, 711 F.3d 426.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
